text: Hi all, I am trying to build a email module that randomly show relative component based on the contact's company  property value. I can get the property value in the emails. But when I tried to create some logic around it e.g. using a if statement to compare the value, it keeps returning false.
I believed that I have tried every way possible before I ask. Any help is appreciated!
Hey Wayne. To use logic on contact properties in email you will need to use <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-programmable-emails|Programmable Email >
Hey Joe, Thanks for your reply.  I actually turned it on already. But I am still getting the same result.
Thanks Joe. I figure it out now. It has to be activated in the Email Template in my case. :+1:
